>
> Ladies and Gentle men,
> I hope you are all fine.
> I'm Mohamed from Egypt, this is my first post here.

> Heirtrix project. I tried to get a checkout which i can work on by
> Eclipse, but i always get the "no such host" when using a CVS client.
> I tried many ways but no good!

Do you get the same message using the cvs command line?

> Now the time is critical, please may any kind person of you send me a
> copy of a working checkout?

Try here: 
http://crawltools.archive.org:8080/cruisecontrol/artifacts/HEAD-heritrix/20050420080620.

Yours,
St.Ack
